body: Francesco, I realize that this solution is a bit hacky but here is how I would achieve what you are trying to do: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/9qTfI6zYOcOqOeO761OBN0gXpW-BIdbNfQy-BpAHOB7nHFnEKEyp4NKYCgKLBUl06u2Pvj25DGiKHaJSfWLE-iqwGGs8GLsU/DataSubset.PNG) You basically just replace those parts of the data set that you don't want with zeros (or add zeros where appropriate) and use a conditional statement to get rid of them on the chart. Let me know if this is what you are going for. -Chris
